biocontainers.name: ganon
biocontainers.summary: ganon: a read classification tool using Interleaved Bloom Filters

biotools.summary:
Precise metagenomics classification against large and up-to-date sets of reference sequences.

benchmarking pipeline used to evaluate ganon as presented in https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/406017v3.
